name: Drilling Mole
description:
Drilling Mole, how far can you go, in this game.

Screenshot Info: The few screenshot we have show off the game difficulty, including how further you get in the game the more rocks show up. 

Game Mode: We recently added one new game mode to the classic timer runs out game mode we also have for our more extreme audience, a non-stop endless gameplay mode where the only timer is death. Get hit 5 times and its game over!

Programmer, Sound, Music, Page Presentation, Video Trailer: ChickenNeko(https://chickenneko.itch.io/)

Main Artist: Orblus(https://orblus.itch.io/)

SFX: http://soundbible.com/1952-Punch-Or-Whack.html

BGM: In the spinning world 120 BPM (No link for this one)

Rate ours and others game here (https://itch.io/jam/game-gen-mini-jam-2020-05-05/entries) [Polls are open until Friday May 8th, 2020]
